about_the_game:
This demo contains only a few maps, the first version's map included with the new weather system. It also contains all the systems and character settings from the full version.

"Endless Days Z is a real-time, do-what-you-want game where you lead a group of survivors through a world ravaged by a deadly plague. High-quality environments such as cities, forests and factories, dense vegetation, collect samples, destroy enemy bases and fight hordes of enemies while searching for a cure." Dystopian enemy, NPCs, looters, military and zombies.

Key Features:

High-definition graphics: Immerse yourself in detailed environments with state-of-the-art visual effects.

Free play: Search enemy bases, destroy as many zombies as possible.

Environments: Explore vast environments.

Solo co-op: Face the threats of DeltaVirus-7 together.

Story: "In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, a team of scientists races against time to find a cure for the DeltaVirus-7. Confront moral dilemmas, forge alliances, and uncover the dark secrets that led to the devastation."

"Prepare for the fight for survival! Add Endless Days Z to your wish list and be the first to face the apocalypse."

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains stealth kills, blood splatter, decaying zombies, decaying corpses, mild language, no abuse or over-the-top deaths.

detailed_description:

name: ENDLESS DAYS Z Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2090
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7500
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3090
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space

short_description: DEMO "Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where you face a variety of enemies, save what is left of this world. Endless Days Z is an intense and immersive survival experience."
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
